about_the_game:
【Story】

For the young girl who cried for help.

A gentle kami who protects children - Yukine.
A voice of a young girl calling for help is spread all over her shrine. 
The sound from the unknowned dimension that is filled with evil made Yukine rushed into it despite the danger.
The horrifying evil spirit restricts the power of the kami, but Yukine still explores the cursed mansion to help the girl.

Why is this mansion cursed?
And where is the young girl who begged for help?
Will Yukine be able to solve the mystery of the cursed mansion and rescue the girl from it?

  

【Gameplay】

Sometimes you need to combine items, solve puzzles, avoid traps and threats.

In order to proceed, it is important to help the ghosts who can't rise into Buddhahood.
You may even get essential items.
  

【Character Introduction】

▲ Yukine

A gentle kami who protects children.
She has been a kami for a long time, but is still a bit childish. Her favorite food is cream puffs.
Upon hearing the girl crying for help, she still rushed into the evil spirit world despite knowing the danger.

 

▲ Girl

Girl trapped in the cursed mansion. 
She has lost all her senses and does not react to any conversation with her.
She seems to have only her heart left, following Yukine as if she is dependent on her.
She is a being between spirit and flesh. She seems to have been born in ancient times...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: After hearing a young girl's cry for help, Yukine as a kami went in to the unknowned dimension to help. While helping the ghosts on the way to fulfill their wishes, she also has to solve riddles and traps. Will Yukine be able to save the girl from this cursed dimension ...?
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
